sentences.sContent: Because of this, researchers have experimented with other techniques, such as this one, to turn adult cells into beta-islet cells.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of this, researchers have experimented with other techniques, such as this one, to turn adult cells into beta-islet cells.
sentences.sCn: 正因为此，研究者们只能使用其他的技术，例如成人干细胞转化胰岛细胞的方法。

sentences.sContent: Unlike more lethal forms of pancreatic cancer, patients with islet cell neuroendocrine tumor have a high survival rate if the disease is removed promptly.
sentences.sContent_eng: Unlike more lethal forms of pancreatic cancer, patients with islet cell neuroendocrine tumor have a high survival rate if the disease is removed promptly.
sentences.sCn: 与更致命的胰腺癌种类不同，如果肿瘤及时切除，胰岛细胞神经内分泌肿瘤患者的存活率很高。
